casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Lesley Eugene WARREN. No. 562A96-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 12, 2004. Leah M. Broker, Asheville, for Warren. Steven F. Bryant, Assistant Attorney General, Ronald L. Moore, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of March 2004 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Petition for Writ of Certiorari Sixty Days After an Order on the Amended Motion for Appropriate Relief Has Been Issued by the Superior Court:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of March 2004."
